MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The only way to cure Shanghai is to 'give the Great Sage handmade chocolate'. Everyone thinks that's impossible, but the Great Sage stubbornly insists it's the right way.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Shanghaiを治なおす唯一ゆいいつの方法ほうほうは『大賢者だいけんじゃに手作てづくりチョコを渡わたす』こと。＊みんなあり得えないと思おもっているのだが、＊大賢者だいけんじゃとやらは頑なにそれが正ただしい方法ほうほうだと言いい続つづける。

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Tch, next time you have to give me a lot of chocolate, or I won't forgive youuu!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: くっ、次つぎは大量たいりょうのチョコをくれないと許ゆるしてやらんからなー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I've already told you to don't run away!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: だから逃にげないで下ください!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Structurally, the back is not connected to the outside. So we don't have to chase after him.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 構造こうぞう的てきに奥おくは外そとに繋つながっていない。＊だから無理むりに追おわなくていい

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I see, so he's like a cornered rat then.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: なるほど、じゃあ袋ふくろのネズミってやつですね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's what I meant. Next time we'll track him down and find out what Shanghai's cure is. If the Great Sage doesn't know, I'll research a cure myself.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: そういうことだ。＊次つぎこそ追おい詰つめて、Shanghaiの治療ちりょう法ほうを聞きき出だす。＊大賢者だいけんじゃが知しらないのなら、私わたしが治療ちりょう法ほうを研究けんきゅうするさ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Until then, you'll have to make do with the sweet medicine I've made for you.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それまでは、私わたしの作つくった甘あまい薬くすりで我慢がまんしてくれ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Beijing......
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Beijing......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Austerlitz, have you had any luck with her treatment?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Austerlitz、＊キミの方ほうは治療ちりょう法ほうについて何なにか収穫しゅうかくがあったかい?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Nothing about a cure. However, I was curious about something else, so I looked for it and found this.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 治療ちりょう法ほうについては何なにも。＊ですが、わたくし気きになるところがあって、＊外そとに出だして調しらべてきました

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is that... an old newspaper?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それは......古ふるい新聞しんぶん?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This library was only recently discovered, but rumour has it that this place has been around for a long time.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: この書庫しょこは最近さいきんになって見みつかった場所ばしょですが、＊噂うわさだけは以前いぜんからあったらしいのです

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Apparently so. So I was wondering if this place was hidden, like due to Nishikese barriers, until it somehow came to light for people to see.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: そうらしいな。だから私わたしはNishikiの結界けっかいのように隠かくれていたものが＊何なんらかの形かたちで人ひとの目めに触ふれるようになったものかと考かんがえていたんだ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I concur too. But then I remembered that there is also the possibility that the buildings that appear suddenly like this are things that existed a long time ago and no longer exist.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: わたくしもです。ですがこのように突然とつぜん現あらわれる建物たてものには、＊昔むかし存在そんざいしていて今いまはないもの、という可能性かのうせいもあることを思おもい出だしたのです

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's right, mist stones can generate phantoms...!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: そうか、幻げん霧む石せきが見みせる幻まぼろし......!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. And my guess seemed to be correct. Look at this newspaper.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: はい。そして推測すいそくは正解せいかいのようでした。＊新聞しんぶんを見みて下ください

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I see, this library was destroyed by fire a long time ago...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: なるほど、この書庫しょこはずっと昔むかしに火事かじで焼失しょうしつしているのか......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So is the Great Sage also a tulpa or something?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ということは、あの大賢者だいけんじゃも思念体しねんたいか何なにか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Sometimes there are tulpas that are as close to corporeal as possible, so we have to be very careful in our judgement. However, if the man who calls himself the Great Sage is shouting aloud that he is the master of this library, then the Great Sage is definitely a tulpa - L'Austerlitz concludes.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 時ときに限かぎりなく実体じったいに近ちかい思念体しねんたいもありますので判断はんだんは慎重しんちょうにすべきです。＊ですがあの自みずからを大賢者だいけんじゃと名乗なのる男おとこがこの書庫しょこの主おもと声高こわだかに叫さけぶのならば、＊大賢者だいけんじゃは間違まちがいなく思念体しねんたいである――とAusterlitzは結論けつろん付つけます

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well then, so we could have pummeled him with all our might. I went easy on him because I thought he was a normal human being.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: なんだ、じゃあ思おもいっきり懲こらしめてやってもよかったんですね。＊普通ふつうのHumanにんげんかと思おもって手加減てかげんしちゃいましたよ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: A tulpa that ensnares a living person is, in other words, an evil spirit.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 生いきているHumanにんげんを陥おとしいれる思念体しねんたいは、＊言い方いかたを変かえれば悪霊あくりょうですからね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But as long as we don't know whether the Great Sage knows the cure or not, we can't defeat him.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ただ、あの大賢者だいけんじゃが治療ちりょう法ほうを知しっているのか分わからない以上いじょうは、＊倒たおしきるわけにもいかないがね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: AAAAAAAAAH!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あーっ!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What's the matter with you shouting, Shanghai, did you discover something important?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 大声おおごえなんて出だしてどうしたんだShanghai。＊何なにか大事だいじな発見はっけんでもしたのか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You, you know what? Don't get mad at me, but I want you to hear me out...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あ、あのさ。＊怒おこらないで聞きいてほしいんだけど......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah. That preface, that's the one that makes people angry.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あ。その前置まえおき、怒おこられるやつですね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Those are the days. When I confessed to bo-shi that I used to use that preface to beat up villains who threatened the peace of the town every day, she got very angry with me and told me I should take care of myself～
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 懐なつかしいなあ。＊私わたしもそんな風かぜに前置まえおきして町まちの平和へいわを脅おびやかす悪党あくとうに＊毎日まいにち殴なぐり込こみかけてたことをBo-shiに打うち明あけた時とき、＊自分じぶんを大切たいせつにしろってとても怒おこられたんですよ～ー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Th-then it's nothing then! Shanghai doesn't know anything!!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: じゃ、じゃあ何なにでもない!＊Shanghaiは何なにも知しらない!!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's okay Shanghai, I won't get angry. So can you please tell me properly?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 大丈夫だいじょうぶだShanghai、怒おこらない。＊だからちゃんと言いってくれないか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: For real? You really won't get angry? Will you promise me? Will you be the sweet Beijing you always are?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ほんとに?ほんとに怒おこらない?＊約束やくそくしてくれる?いつもの優やさしいBeijingでいてくれる?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, for real. Have you ever made me angry?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ああ、本当ほんとうだ。＊私わたしが怒おこったことあるか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: There was the time I spilled ink on all the manuscripts Beijing's team spent an entire night to finish...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Beijingたちが徹夜てつやで仕上しあげた原稿げんこうぜんぶにインクぶちまけた時とき......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's a level of sin that would make any saint sock me in face, I lost count at the number of times bo-shi got angry at me.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あれはどんな聖人せいじんでもグーで殴なぐってくるレベルの罪つみですよ。＊Bo-shiが怒おこった回数かいすうにカウントしてはいけません

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It was so bad that I almost knocked out Tianjin. However, that's a tale that's in past, I don't have grudges over that time or anything, so don't worry about it.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Tianjinが気絶きぜつしかけたほどだったからな。＊まあ過すぎた話はなしだ、あの時ときのことを根ねに持もっていたりしていないから気きにするな

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So you'll never get angry with me?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: じゃあ絶対ぜったいに怒おこらないでいてくれるんだね?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah. I promise.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ああ。約束やくそくだ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Good, that's a relief!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: よかった安心あんしんしたー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You know, the peddler who sold me the chocolate, I just remembered that he was the great sage～
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あのね、実じつはわたしにチョコを売うった行商人ぎょうしょうにんなんだけどさ、＊今いまになってあの大賢者だいけんじゃだったって思おもい出だしたんだ～ー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are you sure about that?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それは確たしかなのか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. When he was a peddler, he was wearing a hood, so it didn't really hit me until just now, but now that I remembered about it, he has the same features!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うん。行商人ぎょうしょうにんの時ときはフードかぶってたから、＊今いまの今いままでいまいちピンときてなかったんだけど、＊よく思おもい出だしたら特徴とくちょう一緒いっしょだった!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: WHY DIDN'T YOU NOTICE IT EARLIER THEN!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: どうしてもっと早はやく気きづかないんだー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You told me you wouldn't get angry!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 怒おこらないって言いったのに!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: If I'd known that, we would have sorted it out earlier. Good grief, you're a real pain in ass, you know that!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それが分わかってたらもっと早はやく解決かいけつしてたんだぞ。＊まったく、キミという奴やつは

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, I'm sorry...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うぅ、ごめんよ......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Oh crud, I promised not to get angry. I'm sorry Shanghai, that was my fault.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ......しまった、怒おこらないって約束やくそくだったな。＊すまないShanghai、今いまのは私わたしが悪わるかった

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Beijing......
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Beijing......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Your symptoms will disappear once we defeat the Great Sage. Look, I'm here for you and everyone else. Let's go and cure your condition together.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 大賢者だいけんじゃを倒たおせばキミの症状しょうじょうは消きえるだろう。＊ほら、私わたしもみんなもついてる。一緒いっしょに身体しんたいを治なおしに行いこう

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Waaaaaah, I'm sorry too Beijing～～!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うわーん、こちらこそごめんよBeijing～～～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shanghai, it's not fair of you to casually jump into bo-shi's chest like that! I want to do it toooo-!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Shanghai、そうやってさりげなくBo-shiの胸むねに飛とび込こむのズルいですよ!＊私わたしだってしたいのにー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wait you two, my hems are all jerked up. Conductor and Austerlitz are watching us, so stop it...!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 待まて二人ふたりとも、裾すそがめくれてしまっている。＊車掌しゃしょうとAusterlitzが見みてるからやめるんだ......!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Do not fret. I can remain motionless when I am watching. I promise you that I will simply be part of the background.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ご心配しんぱいなさらず。＊わたくし、ウォッチングする時ときは微動びどうだにしないでいられます。＊背景はいけいの一部いちぶになることをお約束やくそくしますよ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So you are watching after all!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 結局けっきょく見みてるんじゃないか!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Beijing, don't worry, I'm not looking over here. See, I've got my eyes closed!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Beijing、こちらは見みていないから安心あんしんしてくれ。＊ほら、目めをつぶってるから!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Imagination sometimes surpasses reality, non? Inside Conductor's brain, three people's clothes are being stripped off, one, and another, then another--
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 想像力そうぞうりょくは時ときに現実げんじつを凌駕りょうがしますよね。＊車掌しゃしょうさまの脳内のうないでは三さん人にんの服ふくが一いち枚まい、また一いち枚まいと脱ぬがされて――

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You make me sound like I'm more of a pervert than if I just watched them, so can you please stop!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ただ見みるよりもド変態へんたいに思おもわれるからやめてくれる!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Right, I'm out. Come on, you all, let's move on.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: よし、抜ぬけたっ。＊ほら皆みな、先さきに進すすむぞ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Let me huuuuug you more, Beijing!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: もっとぎゅーっとさせてよBeijing!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Bo-shi, wait for me please～!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Bo-shi、待まって下くださいよ～ー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Beijing quickly pursued forward, while Shanghai and Tianjin ran after her.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ずんずんと先さきに進すすむBeijingを追おって、＊ShanghaiとTianjinが駆かけていく。

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Even though we're still in a pinch for a long time, it's a surprise to see that the mood is so smiley.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ずっとピンチが続つづいていたはずなのだが、＊いつの間まにか微笑ほほえましいムードになっているから、＊まったくもって驚おどろきである。
